definition: a saw/to cut with a saw

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Days back saw better looked saw second help.
sentences.chinese: 天回更看的鋸子看見第二的幫忙。

sentences.english: The workshop where saws are sharpened. It's quite loud inhere, so they work with earphones.
sentences.chinese: 磨鋸子的車間。由於聲音相當大，工人都帶着耳機工作

sentences.english: The carpenter was toothing a saw.
sentences.chinese: 這位木匠正在爲鋸子銼齒。

sentences.english: Sharpening the saw once a week or once a month just isn’t enough.
sentences.chinese: 一週或者一個月磨一次鋸子是不夠的。

sentences.english: I found an old rusty wood-saw without any handle;
sentences.chinese: 我找到了一把生滿了鏽的舊鋸子，連把子也沒有。

sentences.english: You will be sawed in half from head to toe.
sentences.chinese: 因爲你有兩邊的關係，所以用鋸子從頭頂鋸到腳底。

sentences.english: If you absolutely had to, you could use a chain saw in a string quartet.
sentences.chinese: 實在沒轍，您拿鋸子也可以參加絃樂四重奏。

sentences.english: The joints between the cornice can be amended with the saw and the sanding paper .
sentences.chinese: 線板對接時有縫隙，請使用鋸子或者砂紙修整。

sentences.english: 'A plastic saw is no good,' says Ms. Johnson.
sentences.chinese: 約翰遜女士說，給他們塑料鋸子一點好處都沒有。

sentences.english: His father was toothing a saw.
sentences.chinese: 他的爸爸正在爲鋸子銼齒。

sentences.english: Papa said it would grow hair on a crosscut saw.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸說，它能讓木鋸子上都抽出芽來。

sentences.english: He gashed the tree with a saw.
Working with tools, like saw, driller, or a screw driver.
sentences.chinese: 會使用工具，像鋸子，鑽孔，螺絲釘之類。

sentences.english: The Hibiscus has leaves with edges like a saw.
sentences.chinese: 大紅花具有邊緣像鋸子的葉子。

sentences.english: One of them sawed down the trees all the time without ever sharpening his saw.
sentences.chinese: 一個一直在鋸樹卻從來不磨鋸子。

definition: to bore/to burrow/to crawl through a tunnel
made of steel/steel (bar, screw, product etc)
